title: Memorandum of Understanding between the Ministry of External Affairs of Sri Lanka and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Kingdom of Thailand on Bilateral Political Consultations
decision_details: - this Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) will cover bilateral relations and cooperation of mutual interest between the two countries and will also provide a frame work for co-operation in the field of political, economic, trade, investment, cultural, technological and scientific co-operation between the two countries. The above proposal made by Hon. (Prof.) G.L. Peiris, Minister of External Affairs, was approved by the Cabinet.
